mapper.insert:
insert into DOWN_ORDER (ORDER_SEQ_NBR, TRANS_DATE, PAYER_NAME, TRANS_AMT, CHANNEL_FEE_AMT, CHANNEL_CODE, PLAT_SEQ_NBR, DOWN_SEQ_NBR, RETURN_CODE, RETURN_MSG, MER_NO, TRANS_TIME, CHECK_DATE, CHECK_STATUS, ORDER_STATUS, CRT_DATE_TIME, DATE_LASTMAINT) values
(#{downOrder.orderSeqNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downOrder.transDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{downOrder.payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downOrder.transAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{downOrder.channelFeeAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{downOrder.channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downOrder.platSeqNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downOrder.downSeqNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downOrder.returnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downOrder.returnMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downOrder.merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downOrder.transTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{downOrder.checkDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{downOrder.checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downOrder.orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downOrder.crtDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{downOrder.dateLastmaint,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
